sentences.sentence: These prices have prompted many people in the industry feats of rhetorical self - flagellation.
sentences.translation: 这些价格促使许多业内人士发表了自我鞭挞的精彩言论。

sentences.sentence: They need not be engaged in self-flagellation to prove to you or anyone else that they are in the act of improving.
sentences.translation: 他们不必忙于自我鞭策以向你或任何人证明他们正在改进。

sentences.sentence: They are not about to engage in mutual flagellation. The new rules will not be retrospective, and many sanctions will not bite until 2013.
sentences.translation: 它们可不准备互相鞭挞，新规则并没有追溯力，很多制裁要到2013年才实施。
